# Supervised Learning

$$
    Y = f(X)
$$

# Linear Regression

$$
    y = a + bx \\
    y = mx + b \\
    y = a + b_1x_1 + b_2x_2 + \dots + b_px_p
$$

$$
    \hat{\beta} = (X^TX)^{-1}X^TY
$$
# Decision Trees

$$
    \hat{y} = \sum_{m} avg(R)I(x \in R_m)
$$

$$
    \text{logloss} = ylog(p) + (1-y)log(1-p)
$$

$$
    \hat{y}_t = f_t(X) + \hat{y}_{t-1} = \sum_{i=1}^t f_i(x)
$$
